root_causes.description: High number of flux exceptions indicating potential process control weaknesses in financial reporting.
root_causes.financial_impact: Flux exceptions could indicate misstatements in financial reports, potentially impacting decision-making.

remediations.action: Implement enhanced review procedures for flux analysis to ensure accurate financial reporting.
remediations.estimated_effort: 2 weeks of dedicated financial analyst time
remediations.success_criteria: Reduction in flux exceptions by 50% in the next reporting period.
